errors.error_description: The documentation incorrectly states that Piccolo is compatible with Python 3.6, but it requires a newer version of Python due to its use of modern language features.
correction_candidates: Change the requirement to 'Python 3.8 and above'.
Add a note that Python 3.6 requires an older version of Piccolo.
Remove the sentence mentioning Python 3.6 compatibility.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the sentence mentioning Python 3.6 compatibility.

errors.error_description: The installation instructions show the `pip install` command being run before the command to activate the virtual environment. This will install the package in the global or user site-packages instead of the intended virtual environment.
correction_candidates: Move the `pip install` commands to the top, before creating the virtual environment.
Replace `source myenv/bin/activate` with `myenv/bin/pip install 'piccolo[postgres]'` and remove the separate pip install step.
Move the `source myenv/bin/activate` command to be right after `python3 -m venv myenv` and before any `pip install` commands.
Remove the virtual environment creation steps entirely.
errors.golden_answer: Move the `source myenv/bin/activate` command to be right after `python3 -m venv myenv` and before any `pip install` commands.
